roleset.name: do or say again

example.name: arg 1
example.text: We need fair and just immigration reform, not a repeat of history.

roleset.note: Based on Bolt data. Comparison to repeat.01-v. Repeat.01 is a member of VN classes rehearse-26.8, say-37.7-1, and (questionably) stop-55.4. Framed by Katie.

example.name: arg 0 and arg 1
example.text: Those seemingly extra middle two measures with their repeat of the melody from the preceding two measures creates a rhetorical, free-verse feeling.
example.arg: of the melody from teh preceding two measures
